title: Greengrocers' hot pot
description: This hearty vegetarian take on the traditional hotpot has a pretty topping that contains plenty of hidden treasures.Each serving contains 436kcal, 10g protein, 32g carbohydrate	(of which 18g sugars), 27g fat (of which 8g saturates), 14 fibre and	0.3g salt.
ingredients: 1 aubergine, sliced in half lengthways and then into 1cm/½in-thick semi-circles
800g/1lb 12½oz tomatoes (on the vine), cut in half
1 large carrot, cut into ribbons using a vegetable peeler or mandoline
salt and freshly ground black pepper
